/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush green trees on both sides. The trees, standing tall and proud, form a natural canopy over the street, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. 

Parked cars line the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. They are neatly arranged, hinting at the orderly nature of the city. The street itself is devoid of any human activity, adding to the tranquility of the scene.

The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered here and there, like cotton candy floating in a sea of azure. The perspective of the image is from the middle of the street, looking down its length, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene.

The colors in the image are predominantly green and blue, with the green of the trees providing a vibrant contrast to the blue of the sky. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements, a characteristic feature of Beijing's cityscape.
